Content: Guns should have repulsion, changing the speed of ships or at least
moving them. (For planet based units repulsion will be neglected due to
scale). Repulsion may be eliminated by opposing guns (so basically
forces canceling each other out,  be ware of angular moments as they
should send ships spinning which likley will not be simulated and may
be represented by a effect or the need to bur fuel to stabilize).
